EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for Contacting Office Depot
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName}
Thank you for contacting Office Depot. We received the below request to setup a contract account and we look forward to the opportunity of serving all your business needs.
According to our records, your organization already has a contract account. Please contact your Account Manager, Laquetta Morton at 817 358-3054. The Account Manager has the ability to create a login name for you on existing account number 27281050.
Thank you for choosing Office Depot.
